description:
I have acquired this ability in my job at BBVA.
When I started to work for them I did a course to learn faster this ability and be able to add value to the product.
You might be some projects that I did in React like a movie repository (https://github.com/fede16798/ChallengeAlkemyReact) or this portfolio (https://github.com/fede16798/resumeWithReact).

I studied at ORT college, where I was able to learn the basic things about JavaScript.
After that, I keep studying and doing online courses on stream platforms.
This project (https://github.com/fede16798/WppConVenom) is a functionality that responds automatically when you text some number by WhatsApp.

Java was the first programming language that I learned. It was in the college.
Nowadays is the language which I work in every day. In my job, I use java and some frameworks like Spring Boot.
I also have experience doing Api Rest projects for consumption and diverse functionalities.

Spring boot is one of the main tools that I use every day to work.
I learned the basics in BBVA and then I keep doing courses to improve my skills in this framework. I am able to create Api rest and consume them.
I have some projects in my github made with this technology, like a full project made with Spring boot and Hibernate (https://github.com/fede16798/BBVA-Spring-Squad3) or a project that only consumes a crypto api (https://github.com/fede16798/consumingCryptocurrencyApi)

Finishing the college I didn't learn Python and knowing that is one of the most popular languages I decided to take a course: Python Programming in Educacion IT. There I learned all the areas that Python can be used for.
I also took some courses in streaming platforms to deep my knowledge

I learned docker by my own on the Internet and using it in the job. I don't have a lot of experience, but I know how to run some images and using them to program.
I use docker almost, every day at my job to simulate some resources.

I learned the basics in college and got more advanced things on my own, like doing store procedures.
I use sql in my work to consume, create SP, tables the database from Java.
I have worked with MySql, Sql Server and Sybase.
